Text: Hey, thanks for the file. But I'm having a problem-- I'm able to mount the ISO just fine and the Urban Renewal kit works well, but when I try to play or install the game it just quits. Sorry to bother, but I'm a bit confused by this.
Do you people still play this game, it Ancient get sim city 4
Thanks for the upload! This is one of the best games ever.
